original_text: You gave this land to the Israelites, as you had promised to their ancestors. It was a land where there was plenty of food and drink, enough for everyone.
korean_text: 그들에게 주시기로 그 조상들에게 맹세하신 바 젖과 꿀이 흐르는 땅을 그들에게 주셨으므로

sentences.original_text: You gave this land to the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이 땅을 이스라엘 백성에게 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: as you had promised to their ancestors
It was a land where there was plenty of food and drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 음식과 마실 것이 풍부한 땅이었습니다
